changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ai_profiles (user_id, style, streak_days, total_xp, current_level, created_at, updated_at) SELECT u.id, 'practical', 0, 0, 1, NOW(), NOW() FROM users u WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ai_profiles ap WHERE ap.user_id = u.id);
